block.p: ANAHEIM ANGELS--Placed RHP Mark Petkovsek on the 15-day disabled list retroactive to May 17. Recalled RHP Brian Cooper from Edmonton of the PCL.
ANAHEIM ANGELS--Placed RHP Mark Petkovsek on the 15-day disabled list retroactive to May 17. Recalled RHP Brian Cooper from Edmonton of the PCL.

National League HOUSTON ASTROS--Placed RHP Jay Powell on the 15-day disabled list. Purchased the contract of RHP Kip Gross from New Orleans of the PCL. MILWAUKEE BREWERS--Sent LHP Horacio Estrada to Indianapolis of the International League. Recalled LHP Rafael Roque from Indianapolis.
CLEVELAND ROCKERS--Waived G Beverly Williams and G Angela Atterberry.
IHL--Suspended Cincinnati C Byron Ritchie and Grand Rapids C John Emmons for one game each after an incident in a game on May 20.

GREAT LAKES VALLEY CONFERENCE--Announced the resignation of Carl McAloose, commissioner, to become director of athletics at Florida Gulf Coast University. ARMSTRONG ATLANTIC--Named Roger Hodge women's basketball coach.
